mapper.insert: insert into cart(CART_NO, MEMBER_ID, CART_QUANTITY, GOODS_CODE, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_IMAGE, GOODS_COUNT) values(#{cartNo}, #{memberId}, #{cartQuantity}, #{goodsCode}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsCount})
mapper.update: update cart set cart_quantity=#{cartQuantity} where cart_no=#{cartNo}
mapper.select: select a.cart_no, a.member_id, a.cart_quantity, a.goods_code, b.goods_price from cart a left outer join goods b on a.goods_code=b.goods_code where a.member_id=#{memberId}
select * from cart where member_id=#{memberId} and goods_code=#{goodsCode}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where member_id=#{memberId} and goods_Code=#{goodsCode}
